data.title: Helmet Tech Session and Kart Racing
data.meta_description: Helmet Tech Session and Kart Racing at K1 Speed, Carlsbad Thursday, March 3, 2011 6:00 pm K1 Speed/K1 RaceGear 6212 Corte del Abeto, Carlsbad, CA Join us for an evening of fun beginning with a tech se...
data.text:
Helmet Tech Session and Kart Racing at K1 Speed, Carlsbad

Thursday, March 3, 2011

6:00 pm

K1 Speed/K1 RaceGear

6212 Corte del Abeto, Carlsbad, CA

Join us for an evening of fun beginning with a tech session with K1 RaceGear to learn about SNELL 2010 helmets (which will be required for all auto cross and track events in 2011). The session will be held in the Le Mans Conference room at K1 Speed. At K1 RaceGear, they are racers themselves, and understand the value of buying quality racing products at a reasonable price. To meet the needs of their customers, they strive to provide quality racing equipment - including racing shoes, suits, driving gloves, helmets, and more - to racers of all ages at a great value. Whether are just starting out in the sport or you have a life-long passion for racing, they have the products for you in their full line of K1 RaceGear. K1 Race Gear will offer a discount on items purchased within thirty days of the event. http://www.k1racegear.com/

Then it is on to kart racing at K1 Speed (in the same building). We have a very special offer of three races for $35! Come out and join us for an interesting and fun evening. http://www.k1speed.com/carlsbad-location.html
